name: Lycanroc
author: Shiburingaru
flavor_text: Lycanroc attacks its prey with its sharp claws and fangs. It loyally obeys the instructions of a Trainer it trusts.

abilities.name: Spike-Clad
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Spiky Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Clamping Fangs
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
